10,000,000 Volt Thunderbolt.name: 10,000,000 Volt Thunderbolt
10,000,000 Volt Thunderbolt.description: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Absorb.name: Absorb
Absorb.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

Accelerock.name: Accelerock
Accelerock.description: The user smashes into the target at high speed. This move always goes first.

Acid.name: Acid
Acid.description: Opposing Pokémon are attacked with a spray of harsh acid. This may also lower their Sp. Def stats.

Acid Armor.name: Acid Armor
Acid Armor.description: The user alters its cellular structure to liquefy itself, sharply boosting its Defense stat.

Acid Downpour.name: Acid Downpour
Acid Downpour.description: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Acid Spray.name: Acid Spray
Acid Spray.description: The user attacks by spitting fluid that works to melt the target. This also harshly lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.

Acrobatics.name: Acrobatics
Acrobatics.description: The user nimbly strikes the target. This attack does massive damage if the user isn't holding an item.

Acupressure.name: Acupressure
Acupressure.description: The user applies pressure to stress points, sharply boosting one of its or its allies' stats.

Aerial Ace.name: Aerial Ace
Aerial Ace.description: The user confounds the target with speed, then slashes. This attack never misses.

Aeroblast.name: Aeroblast
Aeroblast.description: A vortex of air is shot at the target to inflict damage. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

After You.name: After You
After You.description: The user helps the target and makes it use its move right after the user.

Agility.name: Agility
Agility.description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. This sharply boosts its Speed stat.

Air Cutter.name: Air Cutter
Air Cutter.description: The user launches razor-like wind to slash opposing Pokémon. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

Air Slash.name: Air Slash
Air Slash.description: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. This may also make the target flinch.

All-Out Pummeling.name: All-Out Pummeling
All-Out Pummeling.description: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Alluring Voice.name: Alluring Voice
Alluring Voice.description: The user attacks the target using its angelic voice. This also confuses the target if its stats have been boosted during the turn.

Ally Switch.name: Ally Switch
Ally Switch.description: The user teleports using a strange power and switches places with one of its allies. This move's chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

Amnesia.name: Amnesia
Amnesia.description: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. This sharply boosts the user's Sp. Def stat.

Anchor Shot.name: Anchor Shot
Anchor Shot.description: The user entangles the target with its anchor chain while attacking. The target becomes unable to flee.

Ancient Power.name: Ancient Power
Ancient Power.description: The user attacks with a prehistoric power. This may also boost all the user's stats at once.

Apple Acid.name: Apple Acid
Apple Acid.description: The user attacks the target with an acidic liquid created from tart apples. This also lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.

Aqua Cutter.name: Aqua Cutter
Aqua Cutter.description: The user expels pressurized water to cut at the target like a blade. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

Aqua Jet.name: Aqua Jet
Aqua Jet.description: The user lunges at the target to inflict damage, moving at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

Aqua Ring.name: Aqua Ring
Aqua Ring.description: The user envelops itself in a veil made of water. It regains some HP every turn.

Aqua Step.name: Aqua Step
Aqua Step.description: The user toys with the target and attacks it using light and fluid dance steps. This also boosts the user's Speed stat.

Aqua Tail.name: Aqua Tail
Aqua Tail.description: The user attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.

Arm Thrust.name: Arm Thrust
Arm Thrust.description: The user attacks the target with open-palmed arm thrusts. This move hits two to five times in a row.

Armor Cannon.name: Armor Cannon
Armor Cannon.description: The user shoots its own armor out as blazing projectiles. This also lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def stats.

Aromatherapy.name: Aromatherapy
Aromatherapy.description: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Aromatic Mist.name: Aromatic Mist
Aromatic Mist.description: The user boosts the Sp. Def stat of an ally Pokémon by using a mysterious aroma.

Assist.name: Assist
Assist.description: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Assurance.name: Assurance
Assurance.description: This move's power is doubled if the target has already taken some damage in the same turn.

Astonish.name: Astonish
Astonish.description: The user attacks the target by crying out in a startling fashion. This may also make the target flinch.

Astral Barrage.name: Astral Barrage
Astral Barrage.description: The user attacks by sending a frightful amount of small ghosts at opposing Pokémon.

Attack Order.name: Attack Order
Attack Order.description: The user calls out its underlings to pummel the target. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

Attract.name: Attract
Attract.description: If the target is of the opposite gender to the user, it becomes infatuated with the user and will sometimes be unable to use its moves.

Aura Sphere.name: Aura Sphere
Aura Sphere.description: The user lets loose a pulse of aura power from deep within its body at the target. This attack never misses.

Aura Wheel.name: Aura Wheel
Aura Wheel.description: Morpeko attacks and boosts its Speed stat with the energy stored in its cheeks. This move's type changes depending on the user's form.

Aurora Beam.name: Aurora Beam
Aurora Beam.description: The target is hit with a rainbow-colored beam. This may also lower the target's Attack stat.

Aurora Veil.name: Aurora Veil
Aurora Veil.description: This move reduces damage from physical and special moves for five turns. This can be used only when it is snowing.

Autotomize.name: Autotomize
Autotomize.description: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Avalanche.name: Avalanche
Avalanche.description: This move's power is doubled if the target has inflicted damage on the user in the same turn.

Axe Kick.name: Axe Kick
Axe Kick.description: The user attacks by kicking up into the air and slamming its heel down upon the target. This may also confuse the target. If it misses, the user takes damage instead.

Baby-Doll Eyes.name: Baby-Doll Eyes
Baby-Doll Eyes.description: The user stares at the target with its baby-doll eyes, which lowers the target's Attack stat. This move always goes first.

Baddy Bad.name: Baddy Bad
Baddy Bad.description: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Baneful Bunker.description: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move also poisons any attacker that makes direct contact.

Barb Barrage.name: Barb Barrage
Barb Barrage.description: The user launches countless toxic barbs to inflict damage. This may also poison the target. This move's power is doubled if the target is already poisoned.

Barrage.name: Barrage
Barrage.description: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Barrier.name: Barrier
Barrier.description: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Baton Pass.name: Baton Pass
Baton Pass.description: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting and passes along any stat changes.

Beak Blast.name: Beak Blast
Beak Blast.description: The user first heats up its beak, and then it attacks the target. Making direct contact with the user while it's heating up its beak results in a burn.

Beat Up.name: Beat Up
Beat Up.description: The user gets all party Pokémon to attack the target. The more party Pokémon, the greater the number of attacks.

Behemoth Bash.name: Behemoth Bash
Behemoth Bash.description: The user's body becomes a firm shield and slams into the target fiercely.

Behemoth Blade.name: Behemoth Blade
Behemoth Blade.description: The user wields a large, powerful sword using its whole body and cuts the target in a vigorous attack.

Belch.name: Belch
Belch.description: The user lets out a damaging belch at the target. The user must eat a held Berry to use this move.

Belly Drum.name: Belly Drum
Belly Drum.description: The user maximizes its Attack stat but loses HP equal to half its max HP.

Bestow.name: Bestow
Bestow.description: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Bide.name: Bide
Bide.description: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Bind.name: Bind
Bind.description: A long body, tentacles, or the like are used to bind and squeeze the target for four to five turns.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. This may also make the target flinch.

Bitter Blade.name: Bitter Blade
Bitter Blade.description: The user focuses its bitter feelings toward the world of the living into a slashing attack. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

Bitter Malice.name: Bitter Malice
Bitter Malice.description: The user attacks the target with spine-chilling resentment. This also lowers the target's Attack stat.

Black Hole Eclipse.name: Black Hole Eclipse
Black Hole Eclipse.description: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Blast Burn.name: Blast Burn
Blast Burn.description: The target is razed by a fiery explosion. The user can't move on the next turn.

Blaze Kick.name: Blaze Kick
Blaze Kick.description: The user launches a kick that has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit. This may also leave the target with a burn.

Blazing Torque.name: Blazing Torque
Blazing Torque.description: This move is only used by a Starmobile. It may burn the opponent.

Bleakwind Storm.name: Bleakwind Storm
Bleakwind Storm.description: The user attacks with savagely cold winds that cause both body and spirit to tremble. This may also lower the Speed stats of opposing Pokémon.

Blizzard.name: Blizzard
Blizzard.description: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing Pokémon frozen.

Block.name: Block
Block.description: The user blocks the target's way with arms spread wide to prevent the target from fleeing.

Blood Moon.name: Blood Moon
Blood Moon.description: The user unleashes the full brunt of its spirit from a full moon that shines as red as blood. This move can't be used twice in a row.

Bloom Doom.name: Bloom Doom
Bloom Doom.description: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Blue Flare.name: Blue Flare
Blue Flare.description: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense, yet beautiful, blue flame. This may also leave the target with a burn.

Body Press.name: Body Press
Body Press.description: The user attacks by slamming its body into the target. The higher the user's Defense stat, the greater the damage this move deals.

Body Slam.name: Body Slam
Body Slam.description: The user attacks by dropping onto the target with its full body weight. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

Bolt Beak.name: Bolt Beak
Bolt Beak.description: The user stabs the target with its electrified beak. This move's power is doubled if the user moves before the target.

Bolt Strike.name: Bolt Strike
Bolt Strike.description: The user surrounds itself with a great amount of electricity and charges the target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

Bone Club.name: Bone Club
Bone Club.description: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Bone Rush.name: Bone Rush
Bone Rush.description: The user attacks by striking the target with a hard bone. This move hits two to five times in a row.

Bonemerang.name: Bonemerang
Bonemerang.description: The user throws the bone it holds. The bone loops around to damage the target twice-coming and going.

Boomburst.name: Boomburst
Boomburst.description: The user attacks everything around it with the destructive power of a terrible explosive sound.

Bounce.name: Bounce
Bounce.description: The user bounces up high on the first turn, then drops onto the target on the next turn. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

Bouncy Bubble.name: Bouncy Bubble
Bouncy Bubble.description: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Branch Poke.name: Branch Poke
Branch Poke.description: The user attacks the target by poking it with a sharply pointed branch.

Brave Bird.name: Brave Bird
Brave Bird.description: The user tucks in its wings and charges at a low altitude. This also damages the user quite a lot.

Breaking Swipe.name: Breaking Swipe
Breaking Swipe.description: The user swings its tough tail wildly and attacks opposing Pokémon. This also lowers their Attack stats.

Breakneck Blitz.name: Breakneck Blitz
Breakneck Blitz.description: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Brick Break.name: Brick Break
Brick Break.description: The user attacks with a swift chop. This move can also break barriers, such as Light Screen and Reflect.

Brine.name: Brine
Brine.description: This move's power is doubled if the target's HP is at half or less.

Brutal Swing.name: Brutal Swing
Brutal Swing.description: The user swings its body around violently to inflict damage on everything in its vicinity.

Bubble.name: Bubble
Bubble.description: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Bubble Beam.name: Bubble Beam
Bubble Beam.description: A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the target. This may also lower the target's Speed stat.

Bug Bite.name: Bug Bite
Bug Bite.description: The user attacks by biting the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

Bug Buzz.name: Bug Buzz
Bug Buzz.description: The user vibrates to generate a damaging sound wave. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

Bulk Up.name: Bulk Up
Bulk Up.description: The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body, boosting its Attack and Defense stats.

Bulldoze.name: Bulldoze
Bulldoze.description: The user strikes everything around it by stomping down on the ground. This lowers the Speed stats of those hit.

Bullet Punch.name: Bullet Punch
Bullet Punch.description: The user strikes the target with tough punches as fast as bullets. This move always goes first.

Bullet Seed.name: Bullet Seed
Bullet Seed.description: The user attacks by forcefully shooting seeds at the target. This move hits two to five times in a row.

Burn Up.name: Burn Up
Burn Up.description: To inflict massive damage, the user burns itself out. After using this move, the user will no longer be Fire type.

Burning Bulwark.name: Burning Bulwark
Burning Bulwark.description: The user's intensely hot fur protects it from attacks and also burns any attacker that makes direct contact with it.

Burning Jealousy.name: Burning Jealousy
Burning Jealousy.description: The user attacks with energy from jealousy. This leaves all opposing Pokémon that have had their stats boosted during the turn with a burn.

Buzzy Buzz.name: Buzzy Buzz
Buzzy Buzz.description: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Calm Mind.name: Calm Mind
Calm Mind.description: The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its spirit to boost its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

Camouflage.name: Camouflage
Camouflage.description: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Captivate.name: Captivate
Captivate.description: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Catastropika.name: Catastropika
Catastropika.description: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Ceaseless Edge.name: Ceaseless Edge
Ceaseless Edge.description: The user slashes its shell blade at the target. Shell splinters left behind by this attack remain scattered under the target as spikes.

Celebrate.name: Celebrate
Celebrate.description: The Pokémon congratulates you on your special day!

Charge.name: Charge
Charge.description: The user becomes charged, boosting the power of the next Electric-type move it uses. This also boosts the user's Sp. Def stat.

Charge Beam.name: Charge Beam
Charge Beam.description: The user attacks the target with an electric charge. The residual electricity may also boost the user's Sp. Atk stat.

Charm.name: Charm
Charm.description: The user gazes at the target rather charmingly, making it less wary. This harshly lowers the target's Attack stat.

Chatter.name: Chatter
Chatter.description: The user attacks the target with sound waves of deafening chatter. This also confuses the target.

Chilling Water.name: Chilling Water
Chilling Water.description: The user attacks the target by showering it with water that's so cold it saps the target's power. This also lowers the target's Attack stat.

Chilly Reception.name: Chilly Reception
Chilly Reception.description: The user tells a chillingly bad joke before switching places with a party Pokémon in waiting. This summons a snowstorm lasting five turns.

Chip Away.name: Chip Away
Chip Away.description: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Chloroblast.name: Chloroblast
Chloroblast.description: The user launches its amassed chlorophyll to inflict damage on the target. This also damages the user.

Circle Throw.name: Circle Throw
Circle Throw.description: The target is thrown, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

Clamp.name: Clamp
Clamp.description: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Clanging Scales.name: Clanging Scales
Clanging Scales.description: The user rubs the scales on its entire body and makes a huge noise to attack opposing Pokémon. The user's Defense stat is lowered after the attack.

Clangorous Soul.name: Clangorous Soul
Clangorous Soul.description: The user boosts all its stats by using some of its own HP.

Clangorous Soulblaze.name: Clangorous Soulblaze
Clangorous Soulblaze.description: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Clear Smog.name: Clear Smog
Clear Smog.description: The user attacks the target by throwing a clump of special mud. All stat changes are eliminated.

Close Combat.name: Close Combat
Close Combat.description: The user fights the target up close, inflicting damage without guarding itself. This also lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def stats.

Coaching.name: Coaching
Coaching.description: The user properly coaches its ally Pokémon, boosting their Attack and Defense stats.

Coil.name: Coil
Coil.description: The user coils up and concentrates. This boosts its Attack and Defense stats as well as its accuracy.

Collision Course.name: Collision Course
Collision Course.description: The user transforms and crashes to the ground, causing a massive prehistoric explosion. This move's power is boosted more than usual if it's a supereffective hit.

Combat Torque.name: Combat Torque
Combat Torque.description: This move is only used by a Starmobile. It may paralyze the opponent.

Comet Punch.name: Comet Punch
Comet Punch.description: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Comeuppance.name: Comeuppance
Comeuppance.description: The user retaliates with much greater force against the opponent that last inflicted damage on it.

Confide.name: Confide
Confide.description: The user tells the target a secret, and the target loses its ability to concentrate. This lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

Confuse Ray.name: Confuse Ray
Confuse Ray.description: The target is exposed to a sinister ray that causes confusion.

Confusion.name: Confusion
Confusion.description: The target is hit with a weak telekinetic force to inflict damage. This may also confuse the target.

Constrict.name: Constrict
Constrict.description: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Continental Crush.name: Continental Crush
Continental Crush.description: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Conversion.name: Conversion
Conversion.description: The user changes its type to become the same type as the move at the top of the list of moves it knows.

Conversion 2.name: Conversion 2
Conversion 2.description: The user changes its type to make itself resistant to the type of the move the target used last.

Copycat.name: Copycat
Copycat.description: The user mimics the move used immediately before it. This move fails if no other move has been used yet.

Core Enforcer.name: Core Enforcer
Core Enforcer.description: If the Pokémon damaged by this move have already used their moves that turn, this move eliminates the effects of those Pokémon's Abilities.

Corkscrew Crash.name: Corkscrew Crash
Corkscrew Crash.description: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Corrosive Gas.name: Corrosive Gas
Corrosive Gas.description: The user surrounds everything around it with highly acidic gas and melts away items held by other Pokémon.

Cosmic Power.name: Cosmic Power
Cosmic Power.description: The user absorbs a mystical power from space to boost its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

Cotton Guard.name: Cotton Guard
Cotton Guard.description: The user protects itself by wrapping its body in soft cotton, drastically boosting its Defense stat.

Cotton Spore.name: Cotton Spore
Cotton Spore.description: The user releases cotton-like spores that cling to opposing Pokémon. This harshly lowers their Speed stats.

Counter.name: Counter
Counter.description: A retaliatory attack that counters any physical move, inflicting double the damage taken.

Court Change.name: Court Change
Court Change.description: With its mysterious power, the user swaps the effects on either side of the field.

Covet.name: Covet
Covet.description: The user endearingly approaches the target, then steals the target's held item.

Crabhammer.name: Crabhammer
Crabhammer.description: The target is hammered with a large pincer. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

Crafty Shield.name: Crafty Shield
Crafty Shield.description: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Cross Chop.name: Cross Chop
Cross Chop.description: The user delivers a double chop with its forearms crossed. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

Cross Poison.name: Cross Poison
Cross Poison.description: A slashing attack with a poisonous blade that may also poison the target. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

Crunch.name: Crunch
Crunch.description: The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

Crush Claw.name: Crush Claw
Crush Claw.description: The user slashes the target with hard and sharp claws. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

Crush Grip.name: Crush Grip
Crush Grip.description: The target is crushed with great force. The more HP the target has left, the greater the move's power.

Curse.name: Curse
Curse.description: A move that has different effects depending on whether the user is a Ghost type or not.

Cut.name: Cut
Cut.description: The target is cut with a scythe, a claw, or the like to inflict damage.

Dark Pulse.name: Dark Pulse
Dark Pulse.description: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with ill intent. This may also make the target flinch.

Dark Void.name: Dark Void
Dark Void.description: Opposing Pokémon are dragged into a world of total darkness that puts them to sleep.

Darkest Lariat.name: Darkest Lariat
Darkest Lariat.description: The user swings both arms and hits the target. The target's stat changes don't affect the damage inflicted by this move.

Dazzling Gleam.name: Dazzling Gleam
Dazzling Gleam.description: The user damages opposing Pokémon by emitting a powerful flash.

Decorate.name: Decorate
Decorate.description: The user sharply boosts the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats by decorating the target.

Defend Order.name: Defend Order
Defend Order.description: The user calls out its underlings to shield its body, boosting its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

Defense Curl.name: Defense Curl
Defense Curl.description: The user curls up and boosts its Defense stat.

Defog.name: Defog
Defog.description: A strong wind blows away the target's barriers such as Reflect or Light Screen. This also lowers the target's evasiveness.

Destiny Bond.name: Destiny Bond
Destiny Bond.description: If the user is knocked out after using this move, the Pokémon that knocked it out will also faint. This move's chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

Detect.name: Detect
Detect.description: This move enables the user to protect itself from all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

Devastating Drake.name: Devastating Drake
Devastating Drake.description: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Diamond Storm.name: Diamond Storm
Diamond Storm.description: The user whips up a storm of diamonds to damage opposing Pokémon. This may also sharply boost the user's Defense stat.

Dig.name: Dig
Dig.description: The user burrows into the ground on the first turn, then attacks on the next turn.

Dire Claw.name: Dire Claw
Dire Claw.description: The user lashes out at the target with ruinous claws. This may also leave the target poisoned, paralyzed, or asleep.

Disable.name: Disable
Disable.description: For four turns, the target will be unable to use whichever move it last used.

Disarming Voice.name: Disarming Voice
Disarming Voice.description: Letting out a charming cry, the user does emotional damage to opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses.

Discharge.name: Discharge
Discharge.description: The user strikes everything around it by letting loose a flare of electricity. This may also leave those hit by the attack with paralysis.

Dive.name: Dive
Dive.description: The user dives on the first turn, then floats up and attacks on the next turn.

Dizzy Punch.name: Dizzy Punch
Dizzy Punch.description: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Doodle.name: Doodle
Doodle.description: The user captures the very essence of the target in a sketch. This changes the Abilities of the user and its ally Pokémon to that of the target.

Doom Desire.name: Doom Desire
Doom Desire.description: Two turns after this move is used, a concentrated bundle of light blasts the target.

Double Hit.name: Double Hit
Double Hit.description: The user slams the target with a tail or the like. The target is hit twice in a row.

Double Iron Bash.name: Double Iron Bash
Double Iron Bash.description: The user uses the hex nut in its chest as an axis to spin, striking the target with its arms twice in a row. This may also make the target flinch.

Double Kick.name: Double Kick
Double Kick.description: The user attacks by kicking the target twice in a row using two feet.

Double Shock.name: Double Shock
Double Shock.description: The user discharges all the electricity from its body to perform a high-damage attack. After using this move, the user will no longer be Electric type.

Double Slap.name: Double Slap
Double Slap.description: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Double Team.name: Double Team
Double Team.description: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to boost its evasiveness.

Double-Edge.name: Double-Edge
Double-Edge.description: A reckless life-risking tackle in which the user rushes the target. This also damages the user quite a lot.

Draco Meteor.name: Draco Meteor
Draco Meteor.description: Comets are summoned down from the sky onto the target. The recoil from this move harshly lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat.

Dragon Ascent.name: Dragon Ascent
Dragon Ascent.description: The user attacks the target by dropping out of the sky at high speed. This also lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def stats.

Dragon Breath.name: Dragon Breath
Dragon Breath.description: The user exhales a mighty gust that inflicts damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

Dragon Cheer.name: Dragon Cheer
Dragon Cheer.description: The user raises its allies' morale with a draconic cry so that their future attacks have a heightened chance of landing critical hits. This rouses Dragon types more.

Dragon Claw.name: Dragon Claw
Dragon Claw.description: The user slashes the target with huge, sharp claws to inflict damage.

Dragon Dance.name: Dragon Dance
Dragon Dance.description: The user vigorously performs a mystic, powerful dance that boosts its Attack and Speed stats.

Dragon Darts.name: Dragon Darts
Dragon Darts.description: The user attacks twice using Dreepy. If there are two opposing Pokémon, this move hits each of them once.

Dragon Energy.name: Dragon Energy

Stone Axe.name: Stone Axe
Stone Axe.description: The user swings its stone axes at the target. Stone splinters left behind by this attack float around the target.

Stone Edge.name: Stone Edge
Stone Edge.description: The user stabs the target with sharpened stones. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

Stored Power.name: Stored Power
Stored Power.description: The user attacks the target with stored power. The more the user's stats are boosted, the greater the move's power.

Storm Throw.name: Storm Throw
Storm Throw.description: The user attacks by striking the target with a fierce blow. This move always lands a critical hit.

Strange Steam.name: Strange Steam
Strange Steam.description: The user attacks the target by emitting steam. This may also confuse the target.

Strength.name: Strength
Strength.description: The target is slugged with a punch thrown at maximum power.

Strength Sap.name: Strength Sap
Strength Sap.description: The user restores its own HP by the same amount as the target's Attack stat. It then lowers the target's Attack stat.

String Shot.name: String Shot
String Shot.description: The user blows silk from its mouth that binds opposing Pokémon and harshly lowers their Speed stats.

Struggle.name: Struggle
Struggle.description: This attack is used in desperation only if the user has no remaining PP. It also damages the user a little.

Struggle Bug.name: Struggle Bug
Struggle Bug.description: The user attacks by struggling against opposing Pokémon. This also lowers their Sp. Atk stats.

Stuff Cheeks.name: Stuff Cheeks
Stuff Cheeks.description: The user eats its held Berry, then sharply boosts its Defense stat.

Stun Spore.name: Stun Spore
Stun Spore.description: The user scatters a cloud of numbing powder that paralyzes the target.

Submission.name: Submission
Submission.description: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Substitute.name: Substitute
Substitute.description: The user creates a substitute for itself using some of its own HP. The substitute serves as the user's decoy.

Subzero Slammer.name: Subzero Slammer
Subzero Slammer.description: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Sucker Punch.name: Sucker Punch
Sucker Punch.description: This move enables the user to attack first. This move fails if the target is not readying an attack.

Sunny Day.name: Sunny Day
Sunny Day.description: The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering up Fire-type attacks. The sunlight also lowers the power of Water-type attacks.

Sunsteel Strike.name: Sunsteel Strike
Sunsteel Strike.description: The user slams into the target with the force of a meteor. This move can be used on the target regardless of its Ability.

Super Fang.name: Super Fang
Super Fang.description: The user chomps hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. This cuts the target's HP in half.

Supercell Slam.name: Supercell Slam
Supercell Slam.description: The user electrifies its body and drops onto the target to inflict damage. If this move misses, the user takes damage instead.

Superpower.name: Superpower
Superpower.description: The user attacks the target with great power. This also lowers the user's Attack and Defense stats.

Supersonic.name: Supersonic
Supersonic.description: The user generates odd sound waves from its body that confuse the target.

Supersonic Skystrike.name: Supersonic Skystrike
Supersonic Skystrike.description: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Surf.name: Surf
Surf.description: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.

Surging Strikes.name: Surging Strikes
Surging Strikes.description: The user, having mastered the Water style, strikes the target with a flowing motion three times in a row. This move always lands a critical hit.

Swagger.name: Swagger
Swagger.description: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, this also sharply boosts the target's Attack stat.

Swallow.name: Swallow
Swallow.description: The power stored using the move Stockpile is absorbed by the user to restore its own HP. The more power is stored, the more HP is restored.

Sweet Kiss.name: Sweet Kiss
Sweet Kiss.description: The user kisses the target with a sweet, angelic cuteness that causes confusion.

Sweet Scent.name: Sweet Scent
Sweet Scent.description: The user releases a scent that harshly lowers opposing Pokémon's evasiveness.

Swift.name: Swift
Swift.description: Star-shaped rays are shot at opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses.

Switcheroo.name: Switcheroo
Switcheroo.description: The user trades held items with the target faster than the eye can follow.

Swords Dance.name: Swords Dance
Swords Dance.description: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. This sharply boosts the user's Attack stat.

Synchronoise.name: Synchronoise
Synchronoise.description: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Synthesis.name: Synthesis
Synthesis.description: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

Syrup Bomb.name: Syrup Bomb
Syrup Bomb.description: The user sets off an explosion of sticky candy syrup, which coats the target and causes the target's Speed stat to drop each turn for three turns.

Tachyon Cutter.name: Tachyon Cutter
Tachyon Cutter.description: The user attacks by launching particle blades at the target twice in a row. This attack never misses.

Tackle.name: Tackle
Tackle.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

Tail Glow.name: Tail Glow
Tail Glow.description: The user stares at flashing lights to focus its mind, drastically boosting its Sp. Atk stat.

Tail Slap.name: Tail Slap
Tail Slap.description: The user attacks by striking the target with its hard tail. This move hits two to five times in a row.

Tail Whip.name: Tail Whip
Tail Whip.description: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pokémon less wary. This lowers their Defense stats.

Tailwind.name: Tailwind
Tailwind.description: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that boosts the Speed stats of itself and its allies for four turns.

Take Down.name: Take Down
Take Down.description: A reckless full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. This also damages the user a little.

Take Heart.name: Take Heart
Take Heart.description: The user lifts its spirits, curing its own status conditions and boosting its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

Tar Shot.name: Tar Shot
Tar Shot.description: The user pours sticky tar over the target, lowering the target's Speed stat. The target becomes weaker to Fire-type moves.

Taunt.name: Taunt
Taunt.description: The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for three turns.

Tearful Look.name: Tearful Look
Tearful Look.description: The user gets teary-eyed to make the target lose its combative spirit. This lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

Teatime.name: Teatime
Teatime.description: The user has teatime with all the Pokémon currently in the battle. Each Pokémon eats its held Berry.

Techno Blast.name: Techno Blast
Techno Blast.description: The user attacks by firing a beam of light at the target. This move's type changes depending on the kind of drive held by the user.

Tectonic Rage.name: Tectonic Rage
Tectonic Rage.description: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Teeter Dance.name: Teeter Dance
Teeter Dance.description: The user performs a wobbly dance that confuses every Pokémon around it.

Telekinesis.name: Telekinesis
Telekinesis.description: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Teleport.name: Teleport
Teleport.description: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting, if any. If a wild Pokémon uses this move, it flees.

Temper Flare.name: Temper Flare
Temper Flare.description: Spurred by desperation, the user attacks the target. This move's power is doubled if the user's previous move failed.

Tera Blast.name: Tera Blast
Tera Blast.description: If the user has Terastallized, it unleashes energy of its Tera Type. This move inflicts damage using the Attack or Sp. Atk stat-whichever is higher for the user.

Tera Starstorm.name: Tera Starstorm
Tera Starstorm.description: With the power of its crystals, the user bombards and eliminates the target. When used by Terapagos in its Stellar Form, this move damages all opposing Pokémon.

Terrain Pulse.name: Terrain Pulse
Terrain Pulse.description: The user utilizes the energy of the terrain to attack. This move's type and power change depending on the terrain at the time the move is used.

Thief.name: Thief
Thief.description: The user attacks and steals the target's held item simultaneously. The user can't steal anything if it already holds an item.

Thousand Arrows.name: Thousand Arrows
Thousand Arrows.description: This move can hit opposing Pokémon that are in the air. Those Pokémon will be knocked down to the ground.

Thousand Waves.name: Thousand Waves
Thousand Waves.description: The user attacks with a wave that crawls along the ground. Those it hits can't flee from battle.

Thrash.name: Thrash
Thrash.description: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

Throat Chop.name: Throat Chop
Throat Chop.description: The user attacks the target's throat, and the resultant suffering prevents the target from using sound-based moves for two turns.

Thunder.name: Thunder
Thunder.description: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

Thunder Cage.name: Thunder Cage
Thunder Cage.description: The user traps the target inside a cage of sparking electricity that inflicts damage for four to five turns.

Thunder Fang.name: Thunder Fang
Thunder Fang.description: The user bites with electrified fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it with paralysis.

Thunder Punch.name: Thunder Punch
Thunder Punch.description: The target is attacked with an electrified punch. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

Thunder Shock.name: Thunder Shock
Thunder Shock.description: The user attacks the target with a jolt of electricity. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

Thunder Wave.name: Thunder Wave
Thunder Wave.description: The user launches a weak jolt of electricity that paralyzes the target.

Thunderbolt.name: Thunderbolt
Thunderbolt.description: The user attacks the target with a strong electric blast. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

Thunderclap.name: Thunderclap
Thunderclap.description: This move enables the user to attack first with a jolt of electricity. This move fails if the target is not readying an attack.

Thunderous Kick.name: Thunderous Kick
Thunderous Kick.description: The user overwhelms the target with lightning-like movement before delivering a kick. This also lowers the target's Defense stat.

Tickle.name: Tickle
Tickle.description: The user tickles the target into laughing, lowering its Attack and Defense stats.

Tidy Up.name: Tidy Up
Tidy Up.description: The user tidies up and removes the effects of Spikes, Stealth Rock, Sticky Web, Toxic Spikes, and Substitute. This also boosts the user's Attack and Speed stats.

Topsy-Turvy.name: Topsy-Turvy
Topsy-Turvy.description: All stat changes affecting the target turn topsy-turvy and become the opposite of what they were.

Torch Song.name: Torch Song
Torch Song.description: The user blows out raging flames as if singing a song, scorching the target. This also boosts the user's Sp. Atk stat.

Torment.name: Torment
Torment.description: The user torments and enrages the target, making it incapable of using the same move twice in a row.

Toxic.name: Toxic
Toxic.description: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.

Toxic Spikes.name: Toxic Spikes
Toxic Spikes.description: The user lays a trap of poison spikes at the feet of the opposing team. The spikes will poison opposing Pokémon that switch into battle.

Toxic Thread.name: Toxic Thread
Toxic Thread.description: The user shoots poisonous threads to poison the target and lower the target's Speed stat.

Trailblaze.name: Trailblaze
Trailblaze.description: The user attacks suddenly as if leaping out from tall grass. The user's nimble footwork boosts its Speed stat.

Transform.name: Transform
Transform.description: The user transforms into a copy of the target, right down to having the same move set.

Tri Attack.name: Tri Attack
Tri Attack.description: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. This may also burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.

Trick.name: Trick
Trick.description: The user catches the target off guard and swaps the target's held item with its own.

Trick Room.name: Trick Room
Trick Room.description: The user creates a bizarre area in which slower Pokémon get to move first for five turns.

Trick-or-Treat.name: Trick-or-Treat
Trick-or-Treat.description: The user takes the target trick-or-treating. This adds Ghost type to the target's type.

Triple Arrows.name: Triple Arrows
Triple Arrows.description: The user kicks, then fires three arrows. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit and may also lower the target's Defense stat or make it flinch.

Triple Axel.name: Triple Axel
Triple Axel.description: A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successful hit.

Triple Dive.name: Triple Dive
Triple Dive.description: The user performs a perfectly timed triple dive, hitting the target with splashes of water three times in a row.

Triple Kick.name: Triple Kick
Triple Kick.description: A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successful hit.

Trop Kick.name: Trop Kick
Trop Kick.description: The user lands an intense kick of tropical origins on the target. This also lowers the target's Attack stat.

Trump Card.name: Trump Card
Trump Card.description: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Twin Beam.name: Twin Beam
Twin Beam.description: The user shoots mystical beams from its eyes to inflict damage. The target is hit twice in a row.

Twineedle.name: Twineedle
Twineedle.description: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Twinkle Tackle.name: Twinkle Tackle
Twinkle Tackle.description: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Twister.name: Twister
Twister.description: The user whips up a vicious tornado to tear at opposing Pokémon. This may also make them flinch.

U-turn.name: U-turn
U-turn.description: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

Upper Hand.name: Upper Hand
Upper Hand.description: The user reacts to the target's movement and strikes with the heel of its palm, making the target flinch. This move fails if the target is not readying a priority move.

Uproar.name: Uproar
Uproar.description: The user attacks in an uproar for three turns. During that time, no Pokémon can fall asleep.

V-create.name: V-create
V-create.description: The user emits a hot flame from its forehead and hurls itself at the target to inflict damage. This also lowers the user's Defense, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.

Vacuum Wave.name: Vacuum Wave
Vacuum Wave.description: The user whirls its fists to send a wave of pure vacuum at the target. This move always goes first.

Veevee Volley.name: Veevee Volley
Veevee Volley.description: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Venom Drench.name: Venom Drench
Venom Drench.description: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Venoshock.name: Venoshock
Venoshock.description: The user drenches the target in a special poisonous liquid. This move's power is doubled if the target is poisoned.

Victory Dance.name: Victory Dance
Victory Dance.description: The user performs an intense dance to usher in victory, boosting its Attack, Defense, and Speed stats.

Vine Whip.name: Vine Whip
Vine Whip.description: The target is struck with slender, whiplike vines to inflict damage.

Vise Grip.name: Vise Grip
Vise Grip.description: The target is gripped and squeezed from both sides to inflict damage.

Vital Throw.name: Vital Throw
Vital Throw.description: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Volt Switch.name: Volt Switch
Volt Switch.description: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

Volt Tackle.name: Volt Tackle
Volt Tackle.description: The user electrifies itself and charges the target to inflict damage. This also damages the user quite a lot and may leave the target with paralysis.

Wake-Up Slap.name: Wake-Up Slap
Wake-Up Slap.description: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Water Gun.name: Water Gun
Water Gun.description: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

Water Pledge.name: Water Pledge
Water Pledge.description: A column of water hits the target. When used with its fire counterpart, this move's power is boosted and a rainbow appears.

Water Pulse.name: Water Pulse
Water Pulse.description: The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water. This may also confuse the target.

Water Shuriken.name: Water Shuriken
Water Shuriken.description: The user hits the target with throwing stars two to five times in a row. This move always goes first.

Water Sport.name: Water Sport
Water Sport.description: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

Water Spout.name: Water Spout
Water Spout.description: The user spouts water to damage opposing Pokémon. The lower the user's HP, the lower the move's power.

Waterfall.name: Waterfall
Waterfall.description: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch.

Wave Crash.name: Wave Crash
Wave Crash.description: The user shrouds itself in water and slams into the target with its whole body to inflict damage. This also damages the user quite a lot.

Weather Ball.name: Weather Ball
Weather Ball.description: This move's type and power change depending on the weather at the time the move is used.

Whirlpool.name: Whirlpool
Whirlpool.description: The user traps the target inside a violent, swirling whirlpool that inflicts damage for four to five turns.

Whirlwind.name: Whirlwind
Whirlwind.description: The target is blown away, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

Wicked Blow.name: Wicked Blow
Wicked Blow.description: The user, having mastered the Dark style, strikes the target with a fierce blow. This move always lands a critical hit.

Wicked Torque.name: Wicked Torque
Wicked Torque.description: This move is only used by a Starmobile. It may cause the opponent to fall asleep.

Wide Guard.name: Wide Guard
Wide Guard.description: The user and its allies are protected from wide-ranging attacks for one turn.

Wild Charge.name: Wild Charge
Wild Charge.description: The user shrouds itself in electricity and smashes into the target. This also damages the user a little.

Wildbolt Storm.name: Wildbolt Storm
Wildbolt Storm.description: The user summons a thunderous tempest and savagely attacks with lightning and wind. This may also leave opposing Pokémon with paralysis.

Will-O-Wisp.name: Will-O-Wisp
Will-O-Wisp.description: The user shoots a sinister flame at the target to inflict a burn.

Wing Attack.name: Wing Attack
Wing Attack.description: The target is struck with large, imposing wings spread wide to inflict damage.

Wish.name: Wish
Wish.description: One turn after this move is used, the user's or its replacement's HP is restored by up to half the user's max HP.

Withdraw.name: Withdraw
Withdraw.description: The user withdraws its body into its hard shell, boosting its Defense stat.

Wonder Room.name: Wonder Room
Wonder Room.description: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon's Defense and Sp. Def stats are swapped for five turns.

Wood Hammer.name: Wood Hammer
Wood Hammer.description: The user slams its rugged body into the target to attack. This also damages the user quite a lot.

Work Up.name: Work Up
Work Up.description: The user is roused, and its Attack and Sp. Atk stats are boosted.

Worry Seed.name: Worry Seed
Worry Seed.description: A seed that causes worry is planted on the target. It prevents sleep by making the target's Ability Insomnia.

Wrap.name: Wrap
Wrap.description: A long body, vines, or the like are used to wrap and squeeze the target for four to five turns.

Wring Out.name: Wring Out
Wring Out.description: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.

X-Scissor.name: X-Scissor
X-Scissor.description: The user slashes at the target by crossing its scythes, claws, or the like as if they were a pair of scissors.

Yawn.name: Yawn
Yawn.description: The user lets loose a huge yawn that lulls the target into falling asleep on the next turn.

Zap Cannon.name: Zap Cannon
Zap Cannon.description: The user attacks by firing an electric blast like a cannon. This also leaves the target with paralysis.

Zen Headbutt.name: Zen Headbutt
Zen Headbutt.description: The user focuses its willpower to its head and attacks the target. This may also make the target flinch.

Zing Zap.name: Zing Zap
Zing Zap.description: The user crashes into the target, delivering a powerful electric shock. This may also make the target flinch.

Zippy Zap.name: Zippy Zap
Zippy Zap.description: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.
